title: Roisin KF
content:
Hi, Here's another one of my one zquillion ongoing type projects. I especially want to know how similar this one looks to other faces and well, how about the name? its an homage to the singer of moloko...   
   
 ![Shown here a glimpse of Roisin Hairs KF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101093129im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/4522.gif)
author: delgadovic

comments.content: Yes. More weight. Although giving the user a variety of weights, IMO, is always a nice thing. [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101093129/http:/www.fontbureau.com/) offers a few extremely geometric faces that might be useful by way of inspiration. I'd also add a bit more space per letter on this one. -- I really like the 'g' too.

Like Hrant said about [Haitian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101093129/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/show.pl?29/4518), I think this has   
some potential, but it needs more weight.   
   
The 'a' and 'e' are very nice!
